alert.note: Alert for Harney County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 3:37PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Harney County through 415 PM PDT... At 336 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Idlewild Campground, or 11 miles north of Burns, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Idlewild Campground around 340 PM PDT. Crow Flat Guard Station around 350 PM PDT. Calamity Butte around 400 PM PDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
